amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Pacific Coastal Salmon Recovery program by $15 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Pacific Coastal Salmon Recovery by $15 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 239 (Roll no. 211).
